name: ARShift
desc: An arithmetic right-shift module.

name: ARShift
desc:
Calculates the value of in_ shifted right (arithmetically) by
shiftAmount.

name: inlineVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of the output
port's corresponding signal name.

name: out
desc: The output of this gate.

name: signed
desc: Whether or not this gate operates on a signed number.

name: width
desc: The width of the output for this operation.

name: Add
desc: A two-input addition module.

name: Add
desc: Calculates the sum of in0 and in1.

name: inlineVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of the output
port's corresponding signal name.

name: out
desc: The output of this gate.

name: width
desc: The width of the inputs and outputs for this operation.

name: y
desc: The output of this gate.

name: And2Gate
desc: A two-input AND gate.

name: And2Gate
desc: Calculates the AND of in0 and in1.

name: inlineVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of the output
port's corresponding signal name.

name: out
desc: The output of this gate.

name: width
desc: The width of the inputs and outputs for this operation.

name: y
desc: The output of this gate.

name: AndUnary
desc: A unary AND gate.

name: AndUnary
desc: Calculates whether all bits of in_ are high.

name: inlineVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of the output
port's corresponding signal name.

name: out
desc: The output of this gate (width is always 1).

name: y
desc: The output of this gate (width is always 1).

name: BigLogicValueBigIntUtilities
desc:
Extends BigInt with utility functions that are useful for dealing with
large bit vectors and conversion between types.

name: toIntUnsigned
desc: Returns this BigInt as an int.

name: BusSubset
desc: A Module which gives access to a subset range of signals of the input.

name: BusSubset
desc:
Constructs a Module that accesses a subset from bus which ranges
from startIndex to endIndex (inclusive of both).
When, bus has a width of '1', startIndex and endIndex are ignored
in the generated SystemVerilog.

name: endIndex
desc: End index of the subset.

name: inlineVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of the output
port's corresponding signal name.

name: original
desc: The input to get a subset of.

name: startIndex
desc: Start index of the subset.

name: subset
desc: The output, a subset of original.

name: Case
desc:
A block of CaseItems where only the one with a matching CaseItem.value
is executed.

name: Case
desc: Whenever an item in items matches expression, it will be executed.

name: caseType
desc: Returns the SystemVerilog keyword to represent this case block.

name: conditionalType
desc:
The type of case block this is, for special attributes
(e.g. ConditionalType.unique, ConditionalType.priority).

name: conditionals
desc:
Lists of all Conditionals directly contained within this Conditional
(not including itself).

name: defaultItem
desc: The default to execute when there was no match with any other CaseItems.

name: drivers
desc: Lists all drivers, recursively including all sub-Conditionals drivers.

name: execute
desc:
Executes the functionality of this Conditional and
populates drivenSignals with all Logics that were driven
during execution.

name: expression
desc: A logical signal to match against.

name: isMatch
desc: Returns true iff value matches the expressions current value.

name: items
desc:
An ordered collection of CaseItems to search through for a match
to expression.

name: receivers
desc:
Lists all receivers, recursively including all sub-Conditionals
receivers.

name: verilogContents
desc: Returns a String of SystemVerilog to be used in generated output.

name: CaseItem
desc: Represents a single case within a Case block.

name: CaseItem
desc: Executes then when value matches.

name: then
desc: A List of Conditionals to execute when value is matched.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: value
desc: The value to match against.

name: CaseZ
desc:
A special version of Case which can do wildcard matching via z in
the expression.

name: CaseZ
desc:
Whenever an item in items matches expression, it will be executed, but
the definition of matches allows for z to be a wildcard.

name: caseType
desc: Returns the SystemVerilog keyword to represent this case block.

name: isMatch
desc: Returns true iff value matches the expressions current value.

name: Combinational
desc: Represents a block of combinational logic.

name: Combinational
desc:
Constructs a new Combinational which executes conditionals in order
procedurally.

name: alwaysVerilogStatement
desc: The "always" part of the always block when generating SystemVerilog.

name: assignOperator
desc: The assignment operator to use when generating SystemVerilog.

name: conditionals
desc: A List of the Conditionals to execute.

name: instantiationVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of a module
instantiation.

name: Combinational.ssa
desc:
Constructs a new Combinational where construct generates a list of
Conditionals which use the provided remapping function to enable
a "static single-asssignment" (SSA) form for procedural execution. The
Wikipedia article has a good explanation:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Static_single-assignment_form

name: Conditional
desc:
Represents an some logical assignments or actions that will only happen
under certain conditions.

name: calcPadding
desc:
Calculates an amount of padding to provie at the beginning of each new
line based on indent.

name: conditionals
desc:
Lists of all Conditionals directly contained within this Conditional
(not including itself).

name: driverInput
desc: Gets the input port associated with driver.

name: driverValue
desc:
Gets the value that should be used for execution for the input port
associated with driver.

name: drivers
desc: Lists all drivers, recursively including all sub-Conditionals drivers.

name: execute
desc:
Executes the functionality of this Conditional and
populates drivenSignals with all Logics that were driven
during execution.

name: getConditionals
desc:
Lists of all Conditionals directly contained within this Conditional
(not including itself).

name: getDrivers
desc: Lists all drivers, recursively including all sub-Conditionals drivers.

name: getReceivers
desc:
Lists all receivers, recursively including all sub-Conditionals
receivers.

name: receiverOutput
desc: Gets the output port associated with receiver.

name: receivers
desc:
Lists all receivers, recursively including all sub-Conditionals
receivers.

name: verilogContents
desc: Returns a String of SystemVerilog to be used in generated output.

name: ConditionalAssign
desc: An assignment that only happens under certain conditions.

name: ConditionalAssign
desc: Conditionally assigns receiver to the value of driver.

name: conditionals
desc:
Lists of all Conditionals directly contained within this Conditional
(not including itself).

name: driver
desc: The output of this assignment.

name: drivers
desc: Lists all drivers, recursively including all sub-Conditionals drivers.

name: execute
desc:
Executes the functionality of this Conditional and
populates drivenSignals with all Logics that were driven
during execution.

name: receiver
desc: The input to this assignment.

name: receivers
desc:
Lists all receivers, recursively including all sub-Conditionals
receivers.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: verilogContents
desc: Returns a String of SystemVerilog to be used in generated output.

name: ConditionalGroup
desc: Represents a group of Conditionals to be executed.

name: ConditionalGroup
desc:
Creates a group of conditionals to be executed in order and bundles
them into a single Conditional.

name: conditionals
desc:
Lists of all Conditionals directly contained within this Conditional
(not including itself).

name: drivers
desc: Lists all drivers, recursively including all sub-Conditionals drivers.

name: execute
desc:
Executes the functionality of this Conditional and
populates drivenSignals with all Logics that were driven
during execution.

name: receivers
desc:
Lists all receivers, recursively including all sub-Conditionals
receivers.

name: verilogContents
desc: Returns a String of SystemVerilog to be used in generated output.

name: ConditionalType
desc: Controls characteristics about Case blocks.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: Const
desc: Represents a Logic that never changes value.

name: Const
desc: Constructs a Const with the specified value.

name: CustomSystemVerilog
desc:
Allows a Module to define a custom implementation of SystemVerilog to be
injected in generated output instead of instantiating a separate module.

name: instantiationVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of a module
instantiation.

name: Divide
desc: A two-input divison module.

name: Divide
desc: Calculates in0 divided by in1.

name: inlineVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of the output
port's corresponding signal name.

name: out
desc: The output of this gate.

name: width
desc: The width of the inputs and outputs for this operation.

name: y
desc: The output of this gate.

name: Dumper
desc: Deprecated: use WaveDumper instead.

name: Else
desc: A conditional block to execute only if condition is satisified.

name: Else
desc:
If none of the proceding Iff or ElseIf are executed, then
then will be executed.

name: Else.s
desc:
If none of the proceding Iff or ElseIf are executed, then
then will be executed.

name: ElseIf
desc: A conditional block to execute only if condition is satisified.

name: ElseIf
desc: If condition is 1, then then will be executed.

name: condition
desc: A condition to match against to determine if then should be executed.

name: ElseIf.s
desc: If condition is 1, then then will be executed.

name: then
desc: The Conditionals to execute if condition is satisfied.

name: EmptyReservedNameException
desc: An exception that thrown when a reserved name is null.

name: EmptyReservedNameException
desc: Display error message on empty reserved name string.

name: Equals
desc: A two-input equality comparison module.

name: Equals
desc: Calculates whether in0 and in1 are equal.

name: inlineVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of the output
port's corresponding signal name.

name: out
desc: The output of this gate.

name: y
desc: The output of this gate.

name: ExternalModule
desc: Deprecated - Use ExternalSystemVerilogModule instead.

name: ExternalSystemVerilogModule
desc:
Represents a Module whose definition exists outside of this framework
in SystemVerilog.

name: ExternalSystemVerilogModule
desc: Constructs an instance of an externally defined SystemVerilog module.

name: instantiationVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of a module
instantiation.

name: parameters
desc:
A map of parameter names and values to be passed to the SystemVerilog
module.

name: FF
desc: Deprecated: use Sequential instead.

name: FiniteStateMachine
desc: Simple class for FSM FiniteStateMachine.

name: FiniteStateMachine
desc:
Creates an finite state machine for the specified list of _states, with
an initial state of resetState (when synchronous reset is high) and
transitions on positive clk edges.

name: clk
desc:
The clock signal to the FSM (when only single-triggered). Otherwise, the
first clock.

name: currentState
desc: The current state of the FSM.

name: generateDiagram
desc:
Generate a FSM state diagram _MermaidStateDiagram.
Check on https://mermaid.js.org/intro/ to view the diagram generated.
If you are using vscode, you can download the mermaid extension.

name: getStateIndex
desc:
Provides the corresponding index held in state signals such as
nextState and currentState based on the provided id.

name: FiniteStateMachine.multi
desc:
Creates an finite state machine for the specified list of _states, with
an initial state of resetState (when synchronous reset is high) and
transitions on positive edges of any of _clks.

name: nextState
desc: The next state of the FSM.

name: reset
desc: The reset signal to the FSM.

name: resetState
desc: The reset state of the FSM to default to when the reset signal is high.

name: states
desc: List of all the States in this machine.

name: FlipFlop
desc: Represents a single flip-flop with no reset.

name: FlipFlop
desc: Constructs a flip flop which is positive edge triggered on clk.

name: instantiationVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of a module
instantiation.

name: q
desc: The output of the flop.

name: GreaterThan
desc: A two-input comparison module for greater-than.

name: GreaterThan
desc: Calculates whether in0 is greater than in1.

name: inlineVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of the output
port's corresponding signal name.

name: out
desc: The output of this gate.

name: y
desc: The output of this gate.

name: GreaterThanOrEqual
desc: A two-input comparison module for greater-than-or-equal-to.

name: GreaterThanOrEqual
desc: Calculates whether in0 is greater than or equal to in1.

name: inlineVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of the output
port's corresponding signal name.

name: out
desc: The output of this gate.

name: y
desc: The output of this gate.

name: If
desc:
Represents a chain of blocks of code to be conditionally executed, like
if/else if/else.

name: If
desc:
If condition is high, then then executes, otherwise orElse is
executed.

name: If.block
desc:
Checks the conditions for iffs in order and executes the first one
whose condition is enabled.

name: conditionals
desc:
Lists of all Conditionals directly contained within this Conditional
(not including itself).

name: drivers
desc: Lists all drivers, recursively including all sub-Conditionals drivers.

name: execute
desc:
Executes the functionality of this Conditional and
populates drivenSignals with all Logics that were driven
during execution.

name: iffs
desc: A set of conditional items to check against for execution, in order.

name: receivers
desc:
Lists all receivers, recursively including all sub-Conditionals
receivers.

name: If.s
desc:
If condition is high, then then is excutes,
otherwise orElse is executed.

name: verilogContents
desc: Returns a String of SystemVerilog to be used in generated output.

name: IfBlock
desc:
Represents a chain of blocks of code to be conditionally executed, like
if/else if/else.

name: IfBlock
desc:
Checks the conditions for iffs in order and executes the first one
whose condition is enabled.

name: Iff
desc: A conditional block to execute only if condition is satisified.

name: IllegalConfigurationException
desc: An exception that is thrown when somethins is configured in an illegal way.

name: IllegalConfigurationException
desc:
Creates a new IllegalConfigurationException with a message explaining
what was illegal about it.

name: IndexGate
desc: A two-input bit index gate Module.

name: IndexGate
desc:
Constructs a two-input bit index gate for an abitrary custom functional
implementation.

name: inlineVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of the output
port's corresponding signal name.

name: selection
desc: The output of this gate.

name: InlineSystemVerilog
desc:
Allows a Module to define a special type of CustomSystemVerilog which
can be inlined within other SystemVerilog code.

name: inlineVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of the output
port's corresponding signal name.

name: instantiationVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of a module
instantiation.

name: Interface
desc: Represents a logical interface to a Module.

name: conditionalDriveOther
desc:
Makes this conditionally drive interface signals tagged with tags on
other.

name: conditionalReceiveOther
desc:
Makes this signals tagged with tags be driven conditionally by
other.

name: connectIO
desc:
Connects module's inputs and outputs up to srcInterface and this
Interface.

name: driveOther
desc: Makes this drive interface signals tagged with tags on other.

name: getPorts
desc:
Returns all interface ports associated with the provided tags as a
Map from the port name to the Logic port.

name: port
desc: Accesses a port named name.

name: ports
desc: Maps from the Interface's defined port name to an instance of a Port.

name: receiveOther
desc: Makes this signals tagged with tags be driven by other.

name: setPorts
desc:
Adds a collection of ports to this Interface, each associated with all
of tags.

name: tryPort
desc: Provides the port named name if it exists, otherwise null.

name: InterfaceNameException
desc: An Exception thrown when an interface has an invalid name.

name: InterfaceNameException
desc: Constructs a new Exception for when an interface has an invalid name.

name: InterfaceTypeException
desc: An Exception thrown when an interface has an issue with its type.

name: InterfaceTypeException
desc:
Constructs a new Exception for when an interface has an issue with its
type.

name: InvalidConditionalException
desc:
An exception that is thrown when a Conditional has been constructed in
an invalid way.

name: InvalidConditionalException
desc:
Creates a new InvalidConditionalException with a message explaining
why the conditional was invalid.

name: InvalidMultiplierException
desc:
An exception that thrown when a Logic is replicated with an invalid (<1)
multiplier.

name: InvalidMultiplierException
desc:
Creates an exception when a logic input/output is replicated with an
invalid multiplier

name: InvalidPortNameException
desc: An exception that thrown when a port or interface name is invalid.

name: InvalidPortNameException
desc: Display error message on invalid reserved name.

name: InvalidReservedNameException
desc: An exception that thrown when a reserved name is invalid.

name: InvalidReservedNameException
desc: Display error message on invalid reserved name.

name: InvalidTruncationException
desc:
An exception that is thrown when a LogicValue operation
couldn't be performed due invalid data truncation.

name: InvalidTruncationException
desc:
Creates an exception when an invalid data truncation occurs
from present type to required type.

name: InvalidValueOperationException
desc:
An exception that is thrown when a given operation cannot be performed on
invalid LogicValue

name: InvalidValueOperationException
desc:
An exception that is thrown when a given operation op cannot be
performed on invalid input a i.e., LogicValue.isValid is
false.

name: LShift
desc: A logical left-shift module.

name: LShift
desc: Calculates the value of in_ shifted left by shiftAmount.

name: inlineVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of the output
port's corresponding signal name.

name: out
desc: The output of this gate.

name: signed
desc: Whether or not this gate operates on a signed number.

name: width
desc: The width of the output for this operation.

name: LessThan
desc: A two-input comparison module for less-than.

name: LessThan
desc: Calculates whether in0 is less than in1.

name: inlineVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of the output
port's corresponding signal name.

name: out
desc: The output of this gate.

name: y
desc: The output of this gate.

name: LessThanOrEqual
desc: A two-input comparison module for less-than-or-equal-to.

name: LessThanOrEqual
desc: Calculates whether in0 is less than or equal to in1.

name: inlineVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of the output
port's corresponding signal name.

name: out
desc: The output of this gate.

name: y
desc: The output of this gate.

name: Logic
desc: Represents a logical signal of any width which can change values.

name: operator %
desc: Modulo operation.

name: operator &
desc: Logical bitwise AND.

name: operator *
desc: Multiplication.

name: operator +
desc: Addition.

name: operator -
desc: Subtraction.

name: operator /
desc: Division.

name: operator <
desc: Conditional assignment operator.

name: operator <<
desc: Logical left-shift.

name: operator <=
desc: Connects this Logic directly to another Logic.

name: operator >
desc: Greater-than.

name: operator >=
desc: Greater-than-or-equal-to.

name: operator >>
desc: Arithmetic right-shift.

name: operator >>>
desc: Logical right-shift.

name: Logic
desc: Constructs a new Logic named name with width bits.

name: operator []
desc: Accesses the indexth bit of this signal.

name: operator ^
desc: Logical bitwise XOR.

name: and
desc: Unary AND.

name: arrayIndex
desc:
If this is a part of a LogicArray, the index within that array.
Othwerise, returns null.

name: bit
desc:
The current active value of this signal if it has width 1, as
a LogicValue.

name: changed
desc:
A Stream of LogicValueChanged events which triggers at most once
per Simulator tick, iff the value of the Logic has changed.

name: decr
desc: Shorthand for a Conditional which decrements this by val.

name: divAssign
desc: Shorthand for a Conditional which increments this by val.

name: dstConnections
desc: An Iterable of all Logics that are being directly driven by this.

name: elements
desc: Provides a list of logical elements within this signal.

name: eq
desc: Logical equality.

name: getRange
desc:
Returns a subset Logic.  It is inclusive of startIndex, exclusive of
endIndex.

name: gets
desc: Connects this Logic directly to other.

name: glitch
desc:
A stream of LogicValueChanged events for every time the signal
transitions at any time during a Simulator tick.

name: gt
desc: Greater-than.

name: gte
desc: Greater-than-or-equal-to.

name: hasValidValue
desc: Returns true iff the value of this signal is valid (no x or z).

name: incr
desc: Shorthand for a Conditional which increments this by val.

name: inject
desc: Injects a value onto this signal in the current Simulator tick.

name: isArrayMember
desc: True if this is a member of a LogicArray.

name: isFloating
desc: Returns true iff all bits of the current value are floating (z).

name: isIn
desc:
Returns 1 (of width=1) if the Logic calling this function is in
list. Else 0 (of width=1) if not present.

name: isInput
desc: Returns true iff this signal is an input of its parent Module.

name: isOutput
desc: Returns true iff this signal is an output of its parent Module.

name: isPort
desc: Returns true iff this signal is an input or output of its parent Module.

name: lt
desc: Less-than.

name: lte
desc: Less-than-or-equal-to.

name: makeUnassignable
desc:
Makes it so that this signal cannot be assigned by any full (<=) or
conditional (<) assignment.

name: mulAssign
desc: Shorthand for a Conditional which increments this by val.

name: name
desc: The name of this signal.

name: negedge
desc:
A Stream of LogicValueChanged events which triggers at most once
per Simulator tick, iff the value of the Logic has changed
from 1 to 0.

name: neq
desc: Logical inequality.

name: nextChanged
desc:
Triggers at most once, the next time that this Logic changes
value at the end of a Simulator tick.

name: nextNegedge
desc:
Triggers at most once, the next time that this Logic changes
value at the end of a Simulator tick from 1 to 0.

name: nextPosedge
desc:
Triggers at most once, the next time that this Logic changes
value at the end of a Simulator tick from 0 to 1.

name: or
desc: Unary OR.

name: parentModule
desc: The Module that this Logic exists within.

name: parentStructure
desc:
If this is a part of a LogicStructure, the structure which this is
a part of.  Otherwise, null.

name: posedge
desc:
A Stream of LogicValueChanged events which triggers at most once
per Simulator tick, iff the value of the Logic has changed
from 0 to 1.

name: pow
desc: Power operation

name: previousValue
desc:
The value of this signal before the most recent Simulator.tick had
completed. It will be null before the first tick after this signal is
created.

name: put
desc:
Puts a value val onto this signal, which may or may not be picked up
for changed in this Simulator tick.

name: replicate
desc:
Returns a replicated signal using ReplicationOp with new
width = this.width * multiplier
The input multiplier cannot be negative or 0; an exception will be
thrown, otherwise.

name: reversed
desc: Returns a version of this Logic with the bit order reversed.

name: signExtend
desc:
Returns a new Logic with width newWidth where new bits added are sign
bits as the most significant bits.  The sign is determined using two's
complement, so it takes the most significant bit of the original signal
and extends with that.

name: slice
desc:
Accesses a subset of this signal from startIndex to endIndex,
both inclusive.

name: srcConnection
desc: The Logic signal that is driving this, if any.

name: structureName
desc:
Returns the name relative to the parentStructure-defined hierarchy, if
one exists.  Otherwise, this is the same as name.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: value
desc: The current active value of this signal.

name: valueBigInt
desc: The current valid active value of this signal as a BigInt.

name: valueInt
desc: The current valid active value of this signal as an int.

name: width
desc: The number of bits in this signal.

name: withSet
desc:
Returns a copy of this Logic with the bits starting from startIndex
up until startIndex + update.width set to update instead
of their original value.

name: xor
desc: Unary XOR.

name: zeroExtend
desc:
Returns a new Logic with width newWidth where new bits added are zeros
as the most significant bits.

name: operator |
desc: Logical bitwise OR.

name: operator ~
desc: Logical bitwise NOT.

name: LogicArray
desc: Represents a multi-dimensional array structure of independent Logics.

name: LogicArray
desc:
Creates an array with specified dimensions and elementWidth named
name.

name: clone
desc:
Creates a new LogicArray which has the same dimensions,
elementWidth, numUnpackedDimensions as this.

name: dimensions
desc:
The number of elements at each level of the array, starting from the most
significant outermost level.

name: elementWidth
desc: The width of leaf elements in this array.

name: numUnpackedDimensions
desc:
The number of dimensions which should be treated as "unpacked", starting
from the outermost (first) elements of dimensions.

name: LogicArray.port
desc:
Constructs a new LogicArray with a more convenient constructor signature
for when many ports in an interface are declared together.  Also performs
some basic checks on the legality of the array as a port of a Module.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: LogicConstructionException
desc: An exception that thrown when a Logic is connecting to itself.

name: LogicConstructionException
desc: Creates an exception when a Logic is trying to connect itself.

name: reason
desc: A message describing why the construction failed.

name: LogicStructure
desc:
Collects a group of Logic signals into one entity which can be manipulated
in a similar way as an individual Logic.

name: operator %
desc: Modulo operation.

name: operator &
desc: Logical bitwise AND.

name: operator *
desc: Multiplication.

name: operator +
desc: Addition.

name: operator -
desc: Subtraction.

name: operator /
desc: Division.

name: operator <
desc: Conditional assignment operator.

name: operator <<
desc: Logical left-shift.

name: operator <=
desc: Connects this Logic directly to another Logic.

name: operator >
desc: Greater-than.

name: operator >=
desc: Greater-than-or-equal-to.

name: operator >>
desc: Arithmetic right-shift.

name: operator >>>
desc: Logical right-shift.

name: LogicStructure
desc: Creates a new LogicStructure with elements as elements.

name: operator []
desc: Accesses the indexth bit of this signal.

name: operator ^
desc: Logical bitwise XOR.

name: and
desc: Unary AND.

name: arrayIndex
desc:
If this is a part of a LogicArray, the index within that array.
Othwerise, returns null.

name: bit
desc:
The current active value of this signal if it has width 1, as
a LogicValue.

name: changed
desc:
A Stream of LogicValueChanged events which triggers at most once
per Simulator tick, iff the value of the Logic has changed.

name: clone
desc: Creates a new LogicStructure with the same structure as this.

name: decr
desc: Decrements each element of elements using Logic.decr.

name: divAssign
desc: Divide-assigns each element of elements using Logic.divAssign.

name: dstConnections
desc: An Iterable of all Logics that are being directly driven by this.

name: elements
desc: All elements of this structure.

name: eq
desc: Logical equality.

name: getRange
desc:
Returns a subset Logic.  It is inclusive of startIndex, exclusive of
endIndex.

name: gets
desc: Connects this Logic directly to other.

name: glitch
desc:
A stream of LogicValueChanged events for every time the signal
transitions at any time during a Simulator tick.

name: gt
desc: Greater-than.

name: gte
desc: Greater-than-or-equal-to.

name: hasValidValue
desc: Returns true iff the value of this signal is valid (no x or z).

name: incr
desc: Increments each element of elements using Logic.incr.

name: inject
desc: Injects a value onto this signal in the current Simulator tick.

name: isArrayMember
desc: True if this is a member of a LogicArray.

name: isFloating
desc: Returns true iff all bits of the current value are floating (z).

name: isIn
desc:
Returns 1 (of width=1) if the Logic calling this function is in
list. Else 0 (of width=1) if not present.

name: isInput
desc: Returns true iff this signal is an input of its parent Module.

name: isOutput
desc: Returns true iff this signal is an output of its parent Module.

name: isPort
desc: Returns true iff this signal is an input or output of its parent Module.

name: leafElements
desc:
A list of all leaf-level elements at the deepest hierarchy of this
structure provided in index order.

name: lt
desc: Less-than.

name: lte
desc: Less-than-or-equal-to.

name: makeUnassignable
desc:
Makes it so that this signal cannot be assigned by any full (<=) or
conditional (<) assignment.

name: mulAssign
desc: Multiply-assigns each element of elements using Logic.mulAssign.

name: name
desc: The name of this signal.

name: negedge
desc:
A Stream of LogicValueChanged events which triggers at most once
per Simulator tick, iff the value of the Logic has changed
from 1 to 0.

name: neq
desc: Logical inequality.

name: nextChanged
desc:
Triggers at most once, the next time that this Logic changes
value at the end of a Simulator tick.

name: nextNegedge
desc:
Triggers at most once, the next time that this Logic changes
value at the end of a Simulator tick from 1 to 0.

name: nextPosedge
desc:
Triggers at most once, the next time that this Logic changes
value at the end of a Simulator tick from 0 to 1.

name: or
desc: Unary OR.

name: packed
desc: Packs all elements into one flattened bus.

name: parentModule
desc: The Module that this Logic exists within.

name: parentStructure
desc:
If this is a part of a LogicStructure, the structure which this is
a part of.  Otherwise, null.

name: posedge
desc:
A Stream of LogicValueChanged events which triggers at most once
per Simulator tick, iff the value of the Logic has changed
from 0 to 1.

name: pow
desc: Power operation

name: previousValue
desc:
The value of this signal before the most recent Simulator.tick had
completed. It will be null before the first tick after this signal is
created.

name: put
desc:
Puts a value val onto this signal, which may or may not be picked up
for changed in this Simulator tick.

name: replicate
desc:
Returns a replicated signal using ReplicationOp with new
width = this.width * multiplier
The input multiplier cannot be negative or 0; an exception will be
thrown, otherwise.

name: reversed
desc: Returns a version of this Logic with the bit order reversed.

name: signExtend
desc:
Returns a new Logic with width newWidth where new bits added are sign
bits as the most significant bits.  The sign is determined using two's
complement, so it takes the most significant bit of the original signal
and extends with that.

name: slice
desc:
Accesses a subset of this signal from startIndex to endIndex,
both inclusive.

name: srcConnection
desc:
A LogicStructure never has a direct source driving it, only its
elements do, so always returns null.

name: structureName
desc:
Returns the name relative to the parentStructure-defined hierarchy, if
one exists.  Otherwise, this is the same as name.

name: value
desc: The current active value of this signal.

name: valueBigInt
desc: The current valid active value of this signal as a BigInt.

name: valueInt
desc: The current valid active value of this signal as an int.

name: width
desc: The number of bits in this signal.

name: withSet
desc:
Returns a copy of this Logic with the bits starting from startIndex
up until startIndex + update.width set to update instead
of their original value.

name: xor
desc: Unary XOR.

name: zeroExtend
desc:
Returns a new Logic with width newWidth where new bits added are zeros
as the most significant bits.

name: operator |
desc: Logical bitwise OR.

name: operator ~
desc: Logical bitwise NOT.

name: LogicSwizzle
desc: Allows lists of Logics to be swizzled.

name: rswizzle
desc:
Performs a concatenation operation on the list of signals, where index 0
of this list is the least significant bit(s).

name: swizzle
desc:
Performs a concatenation operation on the list of signals, where index 0
of this list is the most significant bit(s).

name: LogicValue
desc: An immutable 4-value representation of an arbitrary number of bits.

name: operator %
desc: Modulo operation.

name: operator &
desc: Bitwise AND operation.

name: operator *
desc: Multiplication operation.

name: operator +
desc: Addition operation.

name: operator -
desc: Subtraction operation.

name: operator /
desc: Division operation.

name: operator <
desc: Less-than operation.

name: operator <<
desc: Logical left-shift operation.

name: operator <=
desc: Less-than-or-equal operation.

name: operator ==
desc: Returns true iff the width and all bits of this are equal to other.

name: operator >
desc: Greater-than operation.

name: operator >=
desc: Greater-than-or-equal operation.

name: operator >>
desc: Arithmetic right-shift operation.

name: operator >>>
desc: Logical right-shift operation.

name: operator []
desc: Returns the ith bit of this LogicValue

name: operator ^
desc: Bitwise XOR operation.

name: and
desc: Unary AND operation.

name: bit
desc: The current active value of this, if it has width 1, as a LogicValue.

name: clog2
desc: Ceil of log base 2 operation.

name: compareTo
desc: Compares this to other.

name: empty
desc: A zero-width value.

name: eq
desc: Equal-to operation.

name: equalsWithDontCare
desc:
Checks if this is equal to other, except ignoring bits of
which are not valid.

name: extend
desc:
Returns a new LogicValue with width newWidth where the most
significant bits for indices beyond the original width are set
to fill.

name: filled
desc:
Constructs a LogicValue with the width number of bits, where every
bit has the same value of fill.

name: from
desc: Constructs a LogicValue from it.

name: fromBigInt
desc:
Converts BigInt value to a valid LogicValue with width
number of bits.

name: fromBool
desc:
Converts bool value to a valid LogicValue with 1 bits either
one or zero.

name: fromInt
desc:
Converts int value to a valid LogicValue with width
number of bits.

name: fromString
desc:
Converts a binary String representation of a LogicValue into a
LogicValue.

name: getRange
desc:
Returns a subset LogicValue.  It is inclusive of startIndex, exclusive
of endIndex.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: isFloating
desc: True iff all bits are z.

name: isNegedge
desc: Returns true iff the transition represents a negative edge.

name: isPosedge
desc: Returns true iff the transition represents a positive edge.

name: isValid
desc: True iff all bits are 0 or 1, not a single x or z.

name: length
desc: The number of bits in this LogicValue.

name: neq
desc: Not equal-to operation.

name: of
desc: Constructs a LogicValue from val which could be of a variety of types.

name: ofBigInt
desc:
Converts BigInt value to a valid LogicValue with width
number of bits.

name: ofBool
desc:
Converts bool value to a valid LogicValue with 1 bits either
one or zero.

name: ofInferWidth
desc:
Creates a LogicValue of val using of, but attempts to infer the
width that would fit val automatically.

name: ofInt
desc:
Converts int value to a valid LogicValue with width number
of bits.

name: ofIterable
desc: Constructs a LogicValue from it.

name: ofString
desc:
Converts a binary String representation of a LogicValue into a
LogicValue.

name: one
desc: Logical value of 1.

name: or
desc: Unary OR operation.

name: pow
desc: Power operation.

name: replicate
desc: Returns new LogicValue replicated multiplier times.

name: reversed
desc:
Returns a new LogicValue with the order of all bits in the reverse order
of this LogicValue

name: signExtend
desc:
Returns a new LogicValue with width newWidth where new bits added are
sign bits as the most significant bits.  The sign is determined using
two's complement, so it takes the most significant bit of the original
value and extends with that.

name: slice
desc:
Accesses a subset of this LogicValue from startIndex to endIndex,
both inclusive.

name: toBigInt
desc: Converts valid a LogicValue to an int.

name: toBool
desc: Converts a valid logical value to a boolean.

name: toInt
desc: Converts valid a LogicValue to an int.

name: toList
desc:
Returns a this LogicValue as a List<LogicValue> where every element
is 1 bit.

name: toString
desc:
Converts this LogicValue to a binary String, including a decorator at
the front in SystemVerilog style.

name: width
desc: The number of bits in this LogicValue.

name: withSet
desc:
Returns a copy of this LogicValue with the bits starting from
startIndex up until startIndex + update.width set to update
instead of their original value.

name: x
desc: Logical value of x.

name: xor
desc: Unary XOR operation.

name: z
desc: Logical value of z.

name: zero
desc: Logical value of 0.

name: zeroExtend
desc:
Returns a new LogicValue with width newWidth where new bits added are
zeros as the most significant bits.

name: operator |
desc: Bitwise OR operation.

name: operator ~
desc: Returns a new LogicValue with every bit inverted.

name: LogicValueChanged
desc: Represents the event of a Logic changing value.

name: LogicValueChanged
desc:
Represents the event of a Logic changing value from previousValue
to newValue.

name: newValue
desc: The newly updated value of the Logic.

name: previousValue
desc: The previous value of the Logic.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: LogicValueConstructionException
desc: An exception that thrown when a LogicValue cannot be properly constructed.

name: LogicValueConstructionException
desc: Creates an exception for when a construction of a LogicValue fails.

name: LogicValueSwizzle
desc: Allows lists of LogicValues to be swizzled.

name: rswizzle
desc:
Performs a concatenation operation on the list of signals, where index 0
of this list is the least significant bit.

name: swizzle
desc:
Performs a concatenation operation on the list of signals, where index 0
of this list is the most significant bit.

name: LogicValues
desc: Deprecated: use LogicValue instead.

name: MappedSignalAlreadyAssignedException
desc:
An exception that is thrown when Combinational.ssa is attempting to
deduce mappings for signals but fails since a signal would be connected
multiple times.

name: MappedSignalAlreadyAssignedException
desc: Creates a MappedSignalAlreadyAssignedException for signalName.

name: Module
desc:
Represents a synthesizable hardware entity with clearly defined interface
boundaries.

name: Module
desc:
Constructs a new Module with instance name name and definition
name definitionName.

name: addInput
desc:
Registers a signal as an input to this Module and returns an input port
that can be consumed.

name: addInputArray
desc:
Registers and returns an input LogicArray port to this Module with
the specified dimensions, elementWidth, and numUnpackedDimensions
named name.

name: addOutput
desc:
Registers an output to this Module and returns an output port that
can be driven.

name: addOutputArray
desc:
Registers and returns an output LogicArray port to this Module with
the specified dimensions, elementWidth, and numUnpackedDimensions
named name.

name: build
desc: Builds the Module and all subModules within it.

name: definitionName
desc:
The definition name of this Module used when instantiating instances in
generated code.

name: generateSynth
desc: Returns a synthesized version of this Module.

name: hasBuilt
desc: Indicates whether this Module has had the build() method called on it.

name: hierarchy
desc:
Returns an Iterable of Modules representing the hierarchical path to
this Module.

name: hierarchyString
desc:
Returns a pretty-print String of the heirarchy of all Modules within
this Module.

name: input
desc:
Accesses the Logic associated with this Modules input port
named name.

name: inputs
desc:
A map from input port names to this Module to corresponding Logic
signals.

name: internalSignals
desc:
An Iterable of all Logics contained within this Module which are
not an input or output port of this Module.

name: isInput
desc:
Returns true iff net is the same Logic as the input port of this
Module with the same name.

name: isOutput
desc:
Returns true iff net is the same Logic as the output port of this
Module with the same name.

name: isPort
desc:
Returns true iff net is the same Logic as an input or output port of
this Module with the same name.

name: isUnpreferred
desc: Returns true iff the signal name is "unpreferred".

name: name
desc: The name of this Module.

name: output
desc:
Accesses the Logic associated with this Modules output port
named name.

name: outputs
desc:
A map from output port names to this Module to corresponding Logic
signals.

name: parent
desc: The parent Module of this Module.

name: reserveDefinitionName
desc:
If true, guarantees definitionName is maintained by a Synthesizer,
or else it will fail.

name: reserveName
desc:
If true, guarantees uniqueInstanceName matches name or else the
build will fail.

name: signals
desc:
An Iterable of all Logics contained within this Module, including
inputs, outputs, and internal signals of this Module.

name: subModules
desc: An Iterable of all Modules contained within this Module.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: tryInput
desc: Provides the input named name if it exists, otherwise null.

name: tryOutput
desc: Provides the output named name if it exists, otherwise null.

name: uniqueInstanceName
desc:
If this module has a parent, after build this will be a guaranteed
unique name within its scope.

name: unpreferredName
desc:
Makes a signal name "unpreferred" when considering between multiple
possible signal names.

name: ModuleNotBuiltException
desc:
An Exception thrown when a Module was used in a way that required it
to be built first, but it was not yet built.

name: ModuleNotBuiltException
desc:
Constructs a new Exception for when a Module should have been built
before some action was taken.

name: Modulo
desc: A two-input modulo module.

name: Modulo
desc: Calculates the module of in0 % in1.

name: inlineVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of the output
port's corresponding signal name.

name: out
desc: The output of this gate.

name: width
desc: The width of the inputs and outputs for this operation.

name: y
desc: The output of this gate.

name: Multiply
desc: A two-input multiplication module.

name: Multiply
desc: Calculates the product of in0 and in1.

name: inlineVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of the output
port's corresponding signal name.

name: out
desc: The output of this gate.

name: width
desc: The width of the inputs and outputs for this operation.

name: y
desc: The output of this gate.

name: Mux
desc: A mux (multiplexer) module.

name: Mux
desc:
Constructs a multiplexer which passes d0 or d1 to out depending
on if control is 0 or 1, respectively.

name: inlineVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of the output
port's corresponding signal name.

name: out
desc: Output port of the Mux.

name: y
desc: Output port of the Mux.

name: NonSupportedTypeException
desc:
An exception that thrown when runtimeType of expected vector
output from SimCompare is invalid or unsupported.

name: NonSupportedTypeException
desc:
Displays vector which have invalid or unsupported runtimeType
with default error message.

name: NotEquals
desc: A two-input inequality comparison module.

name: NotEquals
desc: Calculates whether in0 and in1 are not-equal.

name: inlineVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of the output
port's corresponding signal name.

name: out
desc: The output of this gate.

name: y
desc: The output of this gate.

name: NotGate
desc: A gate Module that performs bit-wise inversion.

name: NotGate
desc: Constructs a NotGate with in_ as its input.

name: inlineVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of the output
port's corresponding signal name.

name: out
desc: The output of this NotGate.

name: NullReservedNameException
desc: An exception that thrown when a reserved name is null.

name: NullReservedNameException
desc: Display error message on null reserved name.

name: Or2Gate
desc: A two-input OR gate.

name: Or2Gate
desc: Calculates the OR of in0 and in1.

name: inlineVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of the output
port's corresponding signal name.

name: out
desc: The output of this gate.

name: width
desc: The width of the inputs and outputs for this operation.

name: y
desc: The output of this gate.

name: OrUnary
desc: A unary OR gate.

name: OrUnary
desc: Calculates whether any bits of in_ are high.

name: inlineVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of the output
port's corresponding signal name.

name: out
desc: The output of this gate (width is always 1).

name: y
desc: The output of this gate (width is always 1).

name: PairDirection
desc: A direction for signals between a pair of components.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: PairInterface
desc:
A simplified version of Interface which is intended for a common situation
where two components are communicating with each other and may share some
common inputs.

name: PairInterface
desc: Constructs an instance of a PairInterface with the specified ports.

name: addSubInterface
desc:
Registers a new subInterface on this PairInterface, enabling a simple
way to build hierarchical interface definitions.

name: PairInterface.clone
desc:
Creates a new instance of a PairInterface with the same ports other
characteristics.

name: connectIO
desc:
Connects module's inputs and outputs up to srcInterface and this
Interface.

name: modify
desc: A function that can be used to modify all port names in a certain way.

name: pairConnectIO
desc:
A simplified version of connectIO for PairInterfaces where by only
specifying the role, the input and output tags can be inferred.

name: subInterfaces
desc: A mapping from sub-interface names to instances of sub-interfaces.

name: PairRole
desc: The role that a component in a pair plays.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: Pipeline
desc: A simple pipeline, separating arbitrary combinational logic by flop stages.

name: Pipeline
desc:
Constructs a simple pipeline, separating arbitrary combinational logic by
flop stages.

name: clk
desc:
The clock whose positive edge triggers the flops in this pipeline when
single-triggered. Otherwise, the first clock.

name: get
desc:
Gets the pipelined version of logic.  By default stageIndex is the
last stage (the output of the pipeline).

name: Pipeline.multi
desc: Constructs a Pipeline with multiple triggers on any of _clks.

name: reset
desc: An optional reset signal for all pipelined signals.

name: PipelineStageInfo
desc: Information and accessors associated with a Pipeline stage.

name: get
desc:
Returns a staged version of identifier at the current stage, adjusted
by the amount of stageAdjustment.

name: getAbs
desc:
Returns a staged version of identifier at the specified
absolute stageIndex.

name: stage
desc: The index of the current stage in the associated Pipeline.

name: Port
desc:
An extension of Logic which performs some additional validation for
inputs and outputs of Modules.

name: Port
desc: Constructs a Logic intended to be used for ports in an Interface.

name: PortWidthMismatchException
desc: An Exception thrown when a port has the wrong width.

name: PortWidthMismatchException
desc: Constructs a new Exception for when a port has the wrong width.

name: PortWidthMismatchException.equalWidth
desc:
Constructs a new Exception for when two ports should have been the
same width, but were not.

name: Power
desc: A two-input power module.

name: Power
desc: Calculates in0 raise to power of in1.

name: inlineVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of the output
port's corresponding signal name.

name: out
desc: The output of this gate.

name: width
desc: The width of the inputs and outputs for this operation.

name: y
desc: The output of this gate.

name: PutException
desc: An exception that thrown when a Logic signal fails to put.

name: PutException
desc:
Creates an exception for when a put fails on a Logic with context as
to where the

name: RShift
desc: A logical right-shift module.

name: RShift
desc: Calculates the value of in_ shifted right (logically) by shiftAmount.

name: inlineVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of the output
port's corresponding signal name.

name: out
desc: The output of this gate.

name: signed
desc: Whether or not this gate operates on a signed number.

name: width
desc: The width of the output for this operation.

name: RandLogicValue
desc: Allows random generation of LogicValue for BigInt and int.

name: nextLogicValue
desc: Generate unsigned random LogicValue based on width and max num.

name: ReadyValidPipeline
desc: A pipeline that implements Ready/Valid protocol at each stage.

name: ReadyValidPipeline
desc: Constructs a pipeline with Ready/Valid protocol at each stage.

name: ReadyValidPipeline.multi
desc: Creates a ReadyValidPipeline with multiple triggers.

name: readyPipeIn
desc: Indicates that the pipeline is ready to accept new content.

name: readyPipeOut
desc:
Indicates that the receiver of the output of the pipeline
is ready to pull out of the pipeline.

name: validPipeIn
desc: Indicates that the input to the pipeline is valid.

name: validPipeOut
desc:
Indicates that valid contents are ready to be recieved
at the output of the pipeline.

name: ReplicationOp
desc: A Replication Operator Module.

name: ReplicationOp
desc: Constructs a ReplicationOp

name: inlineVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of the output
port's corresponding signal name.

name: replicated
desc: The output of this gate.

name: RohdException
desc: A base type of exception that ROHD-specific exceptions inherit from.

name: RohdException
desc: Creates a new exception with description message.

name: message
desc: A description of what this exception means.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: SelfConnectingLogicException
desc: An exception that thrown when a Logic is connecting to itself.

name: SelfConnectingLogicException
desc: Creates an exception when a Logic is trying to connect itself.

name: Sequential
desc: Represents a block of sequential logic.

name: Sequential
desc: Constructs a Sequential single-triggered by clk.

name: allowMultipleAssignments
desc:
When false, an SignalRedrivenException will be thrown during
simulation if the same signal is driven multiple times within this
Sequential.

name: alwaysVerilogStatement
desc: The "always" part of the always block when generating SystemVerilog.

name: assignOperator
desc: The assignment operator to use when generating SystemVerilog.

name: conditionals
desc: A List of the Conditionals to execute.

name: instantiationVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of a module
instantiation.

name: Sequential.multi
desc: Constructs a Sequential multi-triggered by any of clks.

name: SignalRedrivenException
desc:
An exception that is thrown when a Logic signal is
driven multiple times.

name: SignalRedrivenException
desc:
Displays signals that are driven multiple times
with default error message.

name: SignalWidthMismatchException
desc: An Exception thrown when a signal has the wrong width.

name: SignalWidthMismatchException
desc: Constructs a new Exception for when a signal has the wrong width.

name: SignalWidthMismatchException.forDynamic
desc: Constructs a new Exception for when a dynamic has a wrong width.

name: SignalWidthMismatchException.forNull
desc:
Constructs a new Exception for when a dynamic has no width or it could
not be inferred.

name: SimpleClockGenerator
desc:
A very simple clock generator.  Generates a non-synthesizable SystemVerilog
representation.

name: SimpleClockGenerator
desc:
Constructs a very simple clock generator.  Generates a non-synthesizable
SystemVerilog representation.

name: clk
desc: The generated clock.

name: clockPeriod
desc: The number of time units between repetitions of this clock.

name: instantiationVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of a module
instantiation.

name: Simulator
desc: A functional event-based static simulator for logic behavior.

name: clkStable
desc: Emits an event when most events are complete, and clocks are stable.

name: endSimulation
desc:
Halts the simulation.  Allows the current tick to finish, if there
is one.

name: hasStepsRemaining
desc: Returns true iff there are more steps for the Simulator to tick through.

name: injectAction
desc:
Adds an arbitrary action to be executed as soon as possible, during the
current simulation tick if possible.

name: logger
desc: A global logger object for the Simulator.

name: phase
desc: Gets the current SimulatorPhase of the Simulator.

name: postTick
desc: Emits an event after all events are completed.

name: preTick
desc: Emits an event before any other actions take place on the tick.

name: registerAction
desc: Registers an abritrary action to be executed at timestamp time.

name: registerEndOfSimulationAction
desc:
Registers an arbitrary action to be executed at the end of the
simulation.

name: reset
desc: Resets the entire Simulator back to its initial state.

name: run
desc:
Starts the simulation, executing all pending actions in time-order until
it finishes or is stopped.

name: setMaxSimTime
desc:
Sets a time, after which, the Simulator will halt processing of new
actions.

name: simulationEnded
desc: Completes when the simulation has completed.

name: simulationHasEnded
desc: Returns true iff the simulation has completed.

name: startTick
desc: Emits an event at the start of actions within a tick.

name: throwException
desc:
Collects an exception and associated stackTrace triggered
asynchronously during simulation to be thrown synchronously by run.

name: tick
desc: A single simulation tick.

name: tickExecute
desc: Performs the actual execution of a collection of actions for a tick().

name: time
desc: The current time in the Simulator.

name: SimulatorPhase
desc: An enum for the various phases of the Simulator.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: State
desc: Simple class to initialize each state of the FSM.

name: State
desc:
Represents a state named identifier with a definition of events
and actions associated with that state.

name: actions
desc: Actions to perform while the FSM is in this state.

name: conditionalType
desc: Used to control how different events should be prioritized and matched.

name: defaultNextState
desc: The next state to transition to if non of the events hit.

name: events
desc:
A map of the possible conditions that might be true and the next state
that the FSM needs to transition to in each of those cases.

name: identifier
desc: Identifier or name of the state.

name: StateMachine
desc: Deprecated: use FiniteStateMachine instead.

name: Subtract
desc: A two-input subtraction module.

name: Subtract
desc: Calculates the difference between in0 and in1.

name: inlineVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of the output
port's corresponding signal name.

name: out
desc: The output of this gate.

name: width
desc: The width of the inputs and outputs for this operation.

name: y
desc: The output of this gate.

name: Swizzle
desc: A Module that performs concatenation of signals into one bigger Logic.

name: Swizzle
desc: Constructs a Module which concatenates signals into one large out.

name: inlineVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of the output
port's corresponding signal name.

name: out
desc: The output port containing concatenated signals.

name: SynthBuilder
desc:
A generic class which can convert a module into a generated output using
a Synthesizer.

name: SynthBuilder
desc:
Constructs a SynthBuilder based on the top module and
using synthesizer for generating outputs.

name: getFileContents
desc:
Collects a List of Strings representing file contents generated by
the synthesizer.

name: synthesisResults
desc: All the SynthesisResults generated by this SynthBuilder.

name: synthesizer
desc: The Synthesizer to use for generating an output.

name: top
desc: The top-level Module to be synthesized.

name: SynthesisResult
desc: An object representing the output of a Synthesizer

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: SynthesisResult
desc:
Represents a constant computed synthesis result for module given
the provided type mapping in moduleToInstanceTypeMap.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: instanceTypeName
desc: The name of the definition type for this module instance.

name: matchHashCode
desc: Like the hashCode for matchesImplementation as an equality check.

name: matchesImplementation
desc: Whether two implementations are identical or not

name: module
desc: The top level Module associated with this result.

name: moduleToInstanceTypeMap
desc: A Map from Module instances to synthesis instance type names.

name: toFileContents
desc: Generates what could go into a file

name: Synthesizer
desc: An object capable of converting a module into some new output format

name: generatesDefinition
desc:
Determines whether module needs a separate definition or can just be
described in-line.

name: synthesize
desc:
Synthesizes module into a SynthesisResult, given the mapping in
moduleToInstanceTypeMap.

name: SystemVerilogSynthesizer
desc:
A Synthesizer which generates equivalent SystemVerilog as the
given Module.

name: generatesDefinition
desc:
Determines whether module needs a separate definition or can just be
described in-line.

name: instantiationVerilogWithParameters
desc: Creates a line of SystemVerilog that instantiates module.

name: synthesize
desc:
Synthesizes module into a SynthesisResult, given the mapping in
moduleToInstanceTypeMap.

name: UninitializedSignalException
desc:
An exception that is thrown when Combinational.ssa detects that an SSA
signal is being used before it was initialized.

name: UninitializedSignalException
desc: Creates a UninitializedSignalException for signalName.

name: UnsupportedTypeException
desc: An exception that is thrown when an unsupported type is used.

name: UnsupportedTypeException
desc: Creates an exception when an unsupported type is used.

name: ValueWidthMismatchException
desc: An exception that is thrown when LogicValues of different width are found.

name: ValueWidthMismatchException
desc:
Creates an exception when two LogicValue considered for the operation
are of different width.

name: WaveDumper
desc: A waveform dumper for simulations.

name: WaveDumper
desc:
Attaches a WaveDumper to record all signal changes in a simulation of
module in a VCD file at outputPath.

name: module
desc: The Module being dumped.

name: outputPath
desc: The output filepath of the generated waveforms.

name: WriteAfterReadException
desc: An exception that is thrown when a "write after read" violation occurs.

name: WriteAfterReadException
desc: Creates a WriteAfterReadException.

name: Xor2Gate
desc: A two-input XOR gate.

name: Xor2Gate
desc: Calculates the XOR of in0 and in1.

name: inlineVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of the output
port's corresponding signal name.

name: out
desc: The output of this gate.

name: width
desc: The width of the inputs and outputs for this operation.

name: y
desc: The output of this gate.

name: XorUnary
desc: A unary XOR gate.

name: XorUnary
desc: Calculates the parity of the bits of in_.

name: inlineVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of the output
port's corresponding signal name.

name: out
desc: The output of this gate (width is always 1).

name: y
desc: The output of this gate (width is always 1).

name: bin
desc: Converts a binary String representation to a binary int.

name: cases
desc: Shorthand for a Case inside a Conditional block.

name: flop
desc: Constructs a positive edge triggered flip flop on clk.

name: mux
desc: Performs a multiplexer/ternary operation.

name: rswizzle
desc:
Performs a concatenation operation on the list of signals, where index 0 of
signals is the least significant bit(s).

name: swizzle
desc:
Performs a concatenation operation on the list of signals, where index 0 of
signals is the most significant bit(s).
